entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
